Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the transit gateway multicast domain group member ID.

GetAtt.Description: Information about the registered transit gateway multicast domain group members.
Indicates that the resource is a transit gateway multicast domain group member.
The type of group member, for example static.
The type of resource, for example a VPC attachment.
The ID of the transit gateway attachment.
